name: inexpressively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not show any feelings: My father's lawyer produced a copy of the will and proceeded to read the contents inexpressively. He constantly but inexpressively clenched and unclenched his fists.
More examplesFewer examplesThe young woman at the fruit stall was inexpressively haggling with a customer.She plays the piano with an inexpressively clean tone, but little emotion.When I finally found him, he was sitting inexpressively in a corner of the bar with a glass of beer in his hand.
